ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvdif.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvdif.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvdif.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | nvdif.6 | |- N = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> U e. NrmCVec ) |
| 6 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 7 | 6 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> -u 1 e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> B e. X ) |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_nvscl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ -u 1 e. CC /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_nvdi | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( -u 1 e. CC /\ B e. X /\ ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) ) -> ( -u 1 S ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S B ) G ( -u 1 S ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 7, 8, 11, 12 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S B ) G ( -u 1 S ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 3 | #P_nvnegneg | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S ( -u 1 S A ) ) = A ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S ( -u 1 S A ) ) = A ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S B ) G ( -u 1 S ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S B ) G A ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 3 | #P_nvscl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ -u 1 e. CC /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) e. X ) |
| 18 | 6, 17 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) e. X ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) e. X ) |
| 20 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 21 | 1, 2 | #P_nvcom | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( -u 1 S B ) e. X /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S B ) G A ) = ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) |
| 22 | 5, 19, 20, 21 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S B ) G A ) = ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) |
| 23 | 13, 16, 22 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) = ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( -u 1 S ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) = ( N ` ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) ) |
| 25 | 1, 2 | #P_nvgcl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ B e. X /\ ( -u 1 S A ) e. X ) -> ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) e. X ) |

| 27 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_nvm1 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) e. X ) -> ( N ` ( -u 1 S ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) = ( N ` ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 5, 26, 27 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( -u 1 S ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) = ( N ` ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) |
| 29 | 24, 28 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) = ( N ` ( B G ( -u 1 S A ) ) ) ) |
